H0.text: What term refers to a triangle with two equal sides. Bilateral

H1.text: What term refers to a triangle with two equal sides. Duality

H2.text: What term refers to a triangle with two equal sides. Symmetric

H3.text: What term refers to a triangle with two equal sides. Isoceles

A4.text: Euclid defined an isosceles triangle as a triangle with exactly two equal sides

A5.text: modern treatments prefer to define isosceles triangles as having at least two equal sides
